Looks like you don't have any comments, but I want to be the first to thank you. The Last Airbender was a huge part of my childhood, I loved and still love it. When the Legend of Korra came along, I was overjoyed, and not in the least disappointed by the series. Now, to be able to relive the moments from the The Last Airbender is more than I could have asked for.

Again, thank you.
